Class Deck

java.lang.Object
Deck
public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
The Deck class implements Deck of the game and holds cards of the game.
Since:
4/14/2020

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Deck()
    Instantiates a new Deck with 108 cards.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addCard​(Card cardToAdd)
    Add a card to Deck.(when a card is put the previous card brought back to deck)
    void giveAwayCard​(Player playerToGive)
    Gives away card to players when they're surpassed to pick up card.
    void handOutCard​(Player playerToGive)
    Hands out 7 card to each player at start of the game.
    Card putFirstCard()
    Puts a random first card in game's table.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Deck

      public Deck()
      Instantiates a new Deck with 108 cards. one 0 and two 1-9 normal card for each color one DrawTwo,Skip and reverse card for each color four WildDrawFour ana WildColorCard with black color colors could be green,yellow,red or blue

  • Method Details

    • addCard

      public void addCard​(Card cardToAdd)
      Add a card to Deck.(when a card is put the previous card brought back to deck)
      Parameters:
      cardToAdd - the card to add

    • putFirstCard

      public Card putFirstCard()
      Puts a random first card in game's table.
      Returns:
      the card

    • giveAwayCard

      public void giveAwayCard​(Player playerToGive)
      Gives away card to players when they're surpassed to pick up card.
      Parameters:
      playerToGive - the player to give card to

    • handOutCard

      public void handOutCard​(Player playerToGive)
      Hands out 7 card to each player at start of the game.
      Parameters:
      playerToGive - the player to hand out to
